/*---------------------------------------------
Script Inicial de UP Lakehouse
-----------------------------------------------
Autor: Mauro A. LeÃģn Payano
Fecha: 12/12/2022*/
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 1: Creacion de repositorio de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE DATABASE updatalakehouse;
GO

USE updatalakehouse;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 2: Creacion de dataset por zona de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA master_transaction AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_channel AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_party AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business_knowa AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 3: AsignaciÃģn de clave de encriptaciÃģn y formato de tablas externas
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39248J#asdasdiu89yuj1k23sdd'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-30T09:38:53Z&st=2023-04-26T01:38:53Z&spr=https&sig=rcNXZR7%2B%2BzyBj5nTsCNEbOnL1mO7o6vxu2fCNGEy%2Bhc%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdscamgdev25j.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO



CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPDeltaFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
);
GO



CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPCSVWithHEADERFORMAT
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2)
);
GO
